show_name: Darker than Black - Kuro no Keiyakusha: Gaiden (OAV)
other_title: DARKER THAN BLACK 黒の契約者 外伝 (Japanese)
plot: After the incidents in Tokyo, Hei and Yin try to bury their past and start a new life, but everywhere they go someone seems to be following them. Unaware to Hei, Yin's current odd behavior appears to be related to a prophecy that might lead to the end of the world.
